subject: Public Speaking
title: Narrative Transportation
description: A short lesson to help you apply Narrative Transportation.

hook.text: Great stories transport listeners into the story world.

buildup.text: Transported audiences lower defenses and accept story messages.

discovery.text: Transportation requires vivid detail, relatable characters, suspense.

twist.text: A transported audience doesn't critically evaluate. They experience.

climax.text: This is why stories persuade more than arguments.

punchline.text: Transport them into the story. Defenses drop.

quiz.question: What is narrative transportation?
options: Being absorbed into a story world
